Literature.Title: First example of peptides targeting the dimer interface of Leishmania infantum trypanothione reductase with potent in vitro antileishmanial activity.
Literature.Author: Ruiz-Santaquiteria M, Sánchez-Murcia PA, Toro MA, de Lucio H, Gutiérrez KJ, de Castro S, Carneiro FAC, Gago F, Jiménez-Ruiz A, Camarasa MJ, Velázquez S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Leishmania infantum (promastigote)(LC50=4.3±0.4µM),Leishmania infantum (amastigote)(LC50=1.5±0.3µM),Human acute monocytic leukemia THP-1(LC50=1.2±0.4µM)
